noun.definition: The state of great comfort and extravagant living.
noun.example: He lived a life of luxury.

noun.definition: An inessential, desirable item which is expensive or difficult to obtain.

verb.definition: Enjoy oneself in a luxurious way; take self-indulgent delight.
verb.example: She luxuriated in a hot bath.

usage_examples: They stayed in a luxury hotel.
